categories.name: Invoices and Receipts
categories.description: Any document related to a purchase or service. This includes invoices, bills, receipts, and payment confirmations.

categories.name: Project Documents
categories.description: Documents related to work projects, such as status reports, project plans, meeting notes, or client proposals.

variables.name: vendor
variables.description: Name of the company or person that issued the invoice or receipt.

variables.name: project_name
variables.description: The project identifier or name found within the document.

variables.name: document_type
variables.description: The type of document such as invoice, report, proposal, etc.
